channel.title: CVE Feed for Cerberus FTP Enterprise -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cerberus FTP Enterprise -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5052|2024-08-01T21:03:10.741Z -- cerberus%20ftp%20enterprise -- cerberus%20ftp%20enterprise
item.description: Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability for Cerberus Enterprise 8.0.10.3 web administration. The vulnerability exists when the web server, default port 10001, attempts to process a large number of incomplete HTTP requests.
